titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University of Michigan Espresso Book Machine collection

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: University of Michigan Espresso Book Machine collection

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.scopecontent: Example of one of the first books-on-demand printed on the Espresso Book Machine at the University of Michigan Undergraduate Library, along with press releases and blog entries about the books-on-demand service.
